sn22.62:1.2: “Tayome, bhikkhave, niruttipatha adhivacanapatha pannattipatha asankinna asankinnapubba, na sankiyanti, na sankiyissanti, appatikuttha samanehi brahmanehi vinnuhi.
sn22.62:1.4: Yam, bhikkhave, rupam atitam niruddham viparinatam ‘ahosi’ti tassa sankha, ‘ahosi’ti tassa samanna, ‘ahosi’ti tassa pannatti;
sn22.62:1.5: na tassa sankha ‘atthi’ti, na tassa sankha ‘bhavissati’ti.
sn22.62:2.1: Ya vedana atita niruddha viparinata ‘ahosi’ti tassa sankha, ‘ahosi’ti tassa samanna, ‘ahosi’ti tassa pannatti;
sn22.62:2.2: na tassa sankha ‘atthi’ti, na tassa sankha ‘bhavissati’ti.
sn22.62:3.2: ye sankhara atita niruddha viparinata ‘ahesun’ti tesam sankha, ‘ahesun’ti tesam samanna, ‘ahesun’ti tesam pannatti;
sn22.62:3.3: na tesam sankha ‘atthi’ti, na tesam sankha ‘bhavissanti’ti.
sn22.62:4.1: Yam vinnanam atitam niruddham viparinatam, ‘ahosi’ti tassa sankha, ‘ahosi’ti tassa samanna, ‘ahosi’ti tassa pannatti;
sn22.62:4.2: na tassa sankha ‘atthi’ti, na tassa sankha ‘bhavissati’ti.
sn22.62:5.1: Yam, bhikkhave, rupam ajatam apatubhutam, ‘bhavissati’ti tassa sankha, ‘bhavissati’ti tassa samanna, ‘bhavissati’ti tassa pannatti;
sn22.62:5.2: na tassa sankha ‘atthi’ti, na tassa sankha ‘ahosi’ti.
sn22.62:6.1: Ya vedana ajata apatubhuta, ‘bhavissati’ti tassa sankha, ‘bhavissati’ti tassa samanna, ‘bhavissati’ti tassa pannatti;
sn22.62:6.2: na tassa sankha ‘atthi’ti, na tassa sankha ‘ahosi’ti.
sn22.62:7.2: ye sankhara ajata apatubhuta, ‘bhavissanti’ti tesam sankha, ‘bhavissanti’ti tesam samanna, ‘bhavissanti’ti tesam pannatti;
sn22.62:7.3: na tesam sankha ‘atthi’ti, na tesam sankha ‘ahesun’ti.
sn22.62:8.1: Yam vinnanam ajatam apatubhutam, ‘bhavissati’ti tassa sankha, ‘bhavissati’ti tassa samanna, ‘bhavissati’ti tassa pannatti;
sn22.62:8.2: na tassa sankha ‘atthi’ti, na tassa sankha ‘ahosi’ti.
sn22.62:9.1: Yam, bhikkhave, rupam jatam patubhutam, ‘atthi’ti tassa sankha, ‘atthi’ti tassa samanna, ‘atthi’ti tassa pannatti;
sn22.62:9.2: na tassa sankha ‘ahosi’ti, na tassa sankha ‘bhavissati’ti.
sn22.62:10.1: Ya vedana jata patubhuta, ‘atthi’ti tassa sankha, ‘atthi’ti tassa samanna, ‘atthi’ti tassa pannatti;
sn22.62:10.2: na tassa sankha ‘ahosi’ti, na tassa sankha ‘bhavissati’ti.
sn22.62:11.2: ye sankhara jata patubhuta, ‘atthi’ti tesam sankha, ‘atthi’ti tesam samanna, ‘atthi’ti tesam pannatti;
sn22.62:11.3: na tesam sankha ‘ahesun’ti, na tesam sankha, ‘bhavissanti’ti.
sn22.62:12.1: Yam vinnanam jatam patubhutam, ‘atthi’ti tassa sankha, ‘atthi’ti tassa samanna, ‘atthi’ti tassa pannatti;
sn22.62:12.2: na tassa sankha ‘ahosi’ti, na tassa sankha ‘bhavissati’ti.
sn22.62:13.1: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo niruttipatha adhivacanapatha pannattipatha asankinna asankinnapubba, na sankiyanti, na sankiyissanti, appatikuttha samanehi brahmanehi vinnuhi.
sn22.62:13.2: Yepi te, bhikkhave, ahesum ukkala vassabhanna ahetukavada akiriyavada natthikavada, tepime tayo niruttipathe adhivacanapathe pannattipathe na garahitabbam nappatikkositabbam amannimsu.
